scenario_text.value:
Hey, what do you think was going on with that
Archnemon yesterday?

Well, she did call us “sacrifices,” so
clearly she’s an enemy. I wonder why, though.

And by the way, why is it that Falcomon and
the others are on our side?

It seems like some monsters, like Agumon and
Falcomon, are friendly,

others are willing to help us, even if they
don’t want to be friends, like Tentomon,
Yet they’re all monsters. It’s weird.

You think so? I mean, even with humans, some
people are good and others are bad.
I bet it’s the same with monsters.

In other words, some monsters like us, others
don’t, and still others want to use us.

When you put it like that, I guess it makes
sense.
You really cleared things up for me, Takuma.

You’re right. Even with us humans, some are
good and some are bad.

It would be a mistake to think all monsters
would be the same.

But hey, what are we doing? Did we just
actually have a serious conversation? Haha!

(Minoru may laugh, but I’m sure he has his
own problems and anxieties.)
Man, all that thinking wore me out! Haha!
